block.p: Sometimes, it seems, a fish really does need a bicycle. The feminist Gloria Steinem, 66, and David Bale, 61, a businessman and political activist, were married in Oklahoma. It was the first time for her, the third for him and was a spontaneous decision taken while the two were at a spiritual retreat. ''Honestly, she is as stunned as we all are,'' Suzanne Braun Levine, a former writer for Ms. Magazine, said.
